choices: 1 Week Later (100lbs gained for each brawler)
2 Weeks Later (200lbs gained for each brawler)
3 Weeks Later (300lbs gained for each brawler)
4 Weeks Later (400lbs gained for each brawler)
5 Weeks Later (500lbs gained for each brawler)
1.content: The plane to Delfino Plaza had crashed near the island, and after searching the island, the group of Super Smash Bros Brawl had found seemingly nothing to eat on the island. "DANGIT!" In frustration, Popo (the male Ice Climber) kicked some sand at no one in particular. Some of the sand went into Nana's (the female Ice Climber's) mouth. She stared, then she smiled. "Hey! This stuff tastes like Pixie Stix!" She took a few more bites, and realized that it practically WAS Pixie Stix! The others began testing the rest of the island, and realised that it was made entirely out of sweets, which imediately replenished after being bitten off and such. Link came up with an interesting idea then: "Why don't we see how much we can gain while we wait to be rescued?" Everyone agreed to it.
1.title: Dessert Island

11.content:
A week later, the members of the smash crew were nice and plump, many of their fit (and not-so fit) frames had become less defined.

Especially one Smasher in particular...
11.title: The journey of 1000lbs starts with 100.

choices: He searches around some more and finds it
Samus comes in and catches him with her undergarments
111.content:
Samus was a little uncomfortable with her extra weight. She would eat some bites of the hot fudge mud and then ponder how the Chozo( the bird like statue things that raised her) would react to her gain. Although, she was getting some interesting looks from King Dedede, Snake, and Captain Falcon. She would hobble over and lean on a tree to try and get more of those looks, and it seemed to be working, but she didn't much care for Snake.
"Hey, Samus, do you, uh, want this Nutty Bar?" King Dedede asked nervously.
"Sure, King. Its hard to find those things here. Thanks!" She replied happily accepting the chocolate wafer bar.
Captain Falcon got a little jealous that the penguin got first dibs on Samus. He desperately started looking for something to give her. He grabbed a sugar cookie sand dollar.
"Hey, Sammy! Have this!" He offered kindly.
She grabbed the cookie and marveled at how it sparkled in the sun. She bit into it. It tasted sweet like swallowing five spoonfuls of sugar with light fluffy cotton. Her mouth watered as she took a second bite into the delectable cookie.
"Mmmmmmmmmm... Thank you...." She moaned.
Snake knew he couldn't out do those gifts, so he ran back to the ship. He searched around in the cargo hold until he saw Samus's bags. He opened it and searched around.
"Whoo! Not what I was looking for..." He said as he lifted some bras out of the bag. "Not that either!" He giggled as he pulled out her under wear. "C'mon! Were's that Metroid of her's at!"
111.title: Fat Sammy

1112.content:
"Snake! What the hell are you doing holding my underwear?!" Samus yelled angrily, her hands on her fat-cushioned hips.

"Er wait! It's not what it-" Snake began before he found Samus sitting on him and crushing him. "GAAAH!!!"

"That's it you pervert, I'm gonna handle you now!" Samus then reached a pudgy hand over in her bag and got out what looked like a collar. Putting it around Snake's neck she got up and allowed him to breathe.

"Phew! You nearly killed me!" Snake yelled.

"Would you rather I really do it?" Samus asked darkly.

"No."

"Then shut up. Now then for the next month your gonna wear that obedience collar and pay me back for snooping through my panties."

"But I wasn't!" Snake yelled back. Samus got annoyed by what she believed to be a lie. Pulling out what looked like a Walkie-talkie mixed with a remote. she pressed a few buttons and said...
1112.title: Samus comes in and catches him with her underga...

choices: I'm sure she has everything under control. Let's explore!
11122.content:
"Shut up and clean up this mess you made!" Samus growled into the remote like thing.
Suddenly, Snake started grabbing her clothes and throwing them into her bag.
"FOLD THEM!" She screamed, " FOLD THEM ALL!"
He grabbed some clothes and folded them one-by-one.
Samus left and came back with the metroid he had been searching for. She let it out of it's containment unit and it nudged her. She grabbed it and began to stroke it like one of those evil scientists with a cat.
"FOLD FASTER!" She shouted into the devise.
He folded faster. The metroid did sort of a giggle. He liked to watch others misery, Especially when Samus was causing it.
Outside, everyone was curious to see what the ruckus was that was coming from in the ship.
"Do ya think Snake actually got Samus?" Link asked humorously.
"NOT A CHANCE!" Meta Knight guffawed.
"Should we check up on them?" Daisy asked, munching on the dark chocolate rocks.
"Well..." King Dedede started.
11122.title: Power Of Machinery

choices: "actually Daisy can i ask you a question" said Samus
111221.content:
"um Samus" King Dedede said.
"just get out it's a long story I'll tell you guys later" Samus said
"um ok" said Daisy as the group was leaving
111221.title: Of course we should!

1112212.content:
"yes of course" said Daisy in a sympathetic tone
"well you now how Meta Knight,King Dedede and Snake are interested in me right"said Samus
"yah"said Daisy
"Guys I'm right here you know"Snake said
"SHUT UP AND GO BACK TO CLEANING"yelled Samus
"yes mam"said Snake
"so you were saying"said Daisy
"oh ya which one should I pick"said Samus
"I think you should pick...
1112212.title: "actually Daisy can i ask you a question...

11122122.content: which one should she hook up with
11122122.title: Meta Knight or Snake

choices: NO go get me a plate of chocolate mud brownies
111221221.content:
"SNAKE...WHAT!!! even after what he did"yelled Samus

"well he's alot better then the others,look how well his body is holding up to the weight.he dosen't look like he's gained much at all"said Daisy

"well thats true he does look pretty hot considering my other choices"said Samus

huh i like what i'm hearing Snke thought in his mind

"so Samus can I please explain what I was doing so you can take off this obidience collar"

"well...
111221221.title: Snake      that should be interesting!

choices: The idea is too nasty he doesn't do it
he challenges someone how bad could it be to do one bad thing?
Palutana shows up at random and rescues them all
114.content: Pit was a little more plump than all of the others and he wanted to be the biggest no matter what anyone said soon he gets a sneaky idea to challenge someone to an eating contest and then dispose of them...
114.title: Pit

115.content: Pick the characters you want. If they aren't here then feel free to add more.
115.title: What other Smash characters have gained weight?

1153.content: Perhaps you should insert yourself into the story?
1153.title: More?

11532.content: Should we follow Bayonetta + 100lbs in her experience of the island?
11532.title: Bayonetta

choices: Kick Samus off the island for foul play
12.content:
Everyone was groaning and clutching there mouths and enlarged stomachs. Well, everyone except Kirby and King Dedede, who were eating away at the minty palm trees.
"Why did I ever agree to eating so much damn food!" Meta Knight groaned.
"Poyo!" Kirby squealed shoving ice cream mud into Samus's mouth.
"Kirby! *urf* I don't want any more food... Its...its to much..." She groaned, almost puking.
"Hey, Sammy, you look hot in your fat ass suit!" Snake idolized.
Samus chucked a giant peppermint candy at him and hit him in the face. He fell over and started floating away in the lemonade ocean.
"HEY! SOMEONE HELP ME!" He shrieked.
"Hey, who knew he screamed like a girl..." Falco snickered.
"JUST ONE OF YOU DUMB ASSES GET ME OUTTA HERE! I FEEL STICKY!" He continued to scream.
12.title: 2 Weeks Later And Another One Bites The Dust

122.content:
Soon afterwards the tide washed the genetic soldier away. Fortunately he didn't die, but just got sent somewhere I don't care to describe.

"Good riddance!" Samus uttered as he left. He had hit a sore spot. Samus must've gained at least 80 pounds and it was noticable due to her new gut and fatter legs, though her bust had taken a fair bit of gain (to her pleasure). " I am NOT FAT!"

King Dedede chuckled silently. He knew the gain bothered Samus but he liked it...It made her cuter somehow.

Kirby was merely bigger for some reason and Falco looked like an overstuffed chicken.

Now that he's gone, what should we do?" Falco asked.

Meta Knight sighed. "Well we should..."
122.title: Bye, bye Snake!

1222.content:
During that scene, the others had gotten bored and wandered away. Princess Peach, Daisy, and Zelda went to go find a chocolate spa. Pokemon Trainer, the pokemon, Ness, and Lucas went in search of giant man eating gummi-bears that the locals (which they just halucinated nutty bar sticks talking to them) had mentioned. Mr. GameandWatch went out on his own in search of something completely random, but, no one knew what he was saying, so they just ignored him. It took a while, but Fox finally noticed they were gone.
"Hey! Were'd the princesses go?" He growled through the fur of his stomach, which was big enough to roll him like a ball.
Samus did what you could barely make out as a shrug.
"Where's the watch guy? I need to know if its time for my nap," King Dedede whined.
Everyone broke out in laughter.
"We better go find them. Who knows what's out there..." Falco said dramatically.


Who do you want to go to?
1222.title: where'd they go?

choices: The others try to catch up with them
They get to the village where the locals worship them!
12221.content:
Meanwhile the three monarchs were travelling through the dessert Island, via waddling in an attempt to get to the chocolate spa. All of them were having a hard time due to their sizes.

Peach was top heavy, her once modest bust taking the a sizable amount of gain. At first it was fine, but in time her fat spread elsewhere. Currently she was 218 lbs and her dress was a little tight.

Zelda was bottom heavy, her thighs and ass comparable to Peach's breasts. Walking was hard for her and her dress had to be cut to allow for more walking room. About now she was 236 lbs.

Lastly was Daisy, who drew the short stick and was fat all over. Weighing 300 due to excessive eating and lack of self control she was far bigger than her counterparts but they didn't mind.

"So Peach, where's this spa again?" Asked Zelda, her belly grumbling. As she walked she picked up some candy canes growing on the ground and nibbled on them.

"Well the map says it's nearby." Peach said as she at a cupcake "At the village of Gingerbread people."

"Gingerbread people?" asked Daisy happily rubbing her immense belly. "I could go for some gingerbread."

"Actually I think they're sentient. Besides they couldn't give us the spa treatment if we ate them." Peach explained.

"Oh right." Daisy laughed.

What happens next...?
12221.title: The Not So Pretty Princessess

choices: Toad Goes Insane And Eats The Gingermen
Toad Runs Away Crying And Joins The Guys
122212.content:
As the giantessess waddled to the spa, Peach heard wrestling in some mint bushes.
"Hey, guys, did you hear that?" Peach asked shakily.
"Sorry, Princess Toadstool! It's just me! Lil' Ol Toad!" Blurted a giant over full Toad. He kinda looked like a ball with a mushroom cap on.
"So that's were you went Toad! Did you bring me a chocolate coated marshmallow egg?" Daisy asked patting the toad on the cap.
Toad twiddled his thumbs and answered quietly," N-n-n well... I did but I got hungry on the way... And I sorta... Ate them?"
"YOU MONSTER! MY CHOCOLATE MARSHMALLOW EGGS ARE THE ONLY THING THAT KEEP ME ALIVE!!!!!" Daisy screeched.
Toad started crying out of fear. Peach grabbed him and cradled him in her arms. Toad blushed at his princesses huge breasts. He started fake crying to see what she would do.
"Awww... Poor Toady Woady... Shame on you Daisy! How dare you make my wittle baby cry!" Peach scolded smacking Daisy upside the head.
"Guys! Look! It's the ginger bread people! Zelda squealed!
Peach tossed Toad and ran into the small village.
All the princesses ran and pushed their way in. The villagers came out and pointed and stared at them. A giant gingerbread man with red and blue icing came walking towards them. He had two other slittly smaller ginger people following close behind. He poked and prodded at the princesses.
"HELLO! MY NAME IS PRINCESS TOADSTOOL! YOU CAN CALL ME PEACH! WE COME IN PEACE AND SEARCH FOR THE CHOCOLATE SPA!" Peach said roboticly and very slowly using various hand gestures.
The gingermen started group rummbling.
"Choco choco! Peety peety yum yum! Shasta stew yum yum!" One of them yelled rubbing his stomach. The group broke out in laughter and copying him.
An older looking one started bowing down and speeking.
"Moracka sho shava do le llamaa!" He chanted bowing down to the monarchs. The rest of the group gasped and started bowing and chanting with him. The king led them to an entirley chocolate area.
It had a chococuzie and a massagelate, and maniclates and chocledies. There were even chcolate grass, trees, and waterfalls! The girls jumped into the chococuzie and had the gingermen give them chocledies and manilates.
"It feels like I'm makin love with Willy Wonka!" Zelda groaned as the jets pushed warm chocolate around them.
"Girl, how would you even know what that feels like?" Daisy asked licking some chocolate as a gingerman gave her a back rub.
"It's just a guess at what it feels like," Zelda retorted calmly.
Toad stood there in disbeilief. 'She actually picked cookies over ME?!' He thought. A ginger man ran up and looked at him. Toad bit his head off in anger.
What now?
122212.title: Toad meets his match

choices: Told them that they would be chosen for a special eating contest
1222121.content:
Still consumed with wrath Toad continued to devour the poor ginger bread man, glad that there was one less upstart to try and steal his princess's attention. As he swallowed the deliscious stranger he decided to eat a few more. Waddling over to a group who were talking he took a huge chomp off of one's hand, then quickly ate him and his companions. All the nearby gingerbread men squealed in fear when Peach got up and looked sternly at Toad.

"Toad! Do I need to send yu away?" she asked as a parent would its child. The blobby mushroom man shook his head no. "Then quit eating these nice candy people!"

"But princess, they're taking my job as your attendant. Besides you picked them over me!"

"Toad, I only did that ecause we're on vacation and we all need to relax. I don't want you to worry about serving me. Just eat the Non sentient candy and have fun, okay?"

"Okay." Toad said meekly before going away for awhile while he was gone the elder gingerbread man came to see the princesses and...
1222121.title: Toad Goes Insane And Eats The Gingermen

15.content:
5 weeks later, All 35 brawlers were each 500 pounds. Each of them were like blobs. With huge bellys, flabby arms and thighs, watermelon sized man-boobs/breasts, triple chins, big pillow-like butt cheeks, and baseball sized cheeks. They were easily becoming addicted.

Who should the story foward to?
15.title: 5 Weeks Later...

choices: He keeps the tree to himself
152.content: Pit, Samus, And Zelda were wanting more and despite how fat they were they wanted more Pit looked over and saw a tree the 500 pound angel snuck off and plucked one of the fruits off the tree and ate it it was the sweetest thing he ever tasted he wanted to eat more but he also wanted to share but if he kept the tree to himself he could get bigger than all the brawlers what will he do?
152.title: Samus, Zelda, and Pit

choices: He finds that there is a village on the iland
He looks for more of thouse fruits
1522.content: After the frist bite Pit was adickted to the fruit and ate all of them. After he ate all of them he gained 100 pounds.
1522.title: He keeps the tree to himself

154.content: The three of them started seeing the other brawlers as dessert after eating so much. What decision do they make?
154.title: Sonic, Fox, Wolf

choices: an hour of frantic binging later...
1541.content:
After a split second, Fox snapped out of his trance. Even though he was absolutely huge - bursting out of his old uniform in several locations, despite its stretchiness - he knew that his fellow fighters were alongside him and couldn't be eaten. Especially because they, too, had become much larger than they used to be.

Surveying his surroundings, Fox saw that Sonic and Wolf had both had the same image of their fellow fighters as food, only theirs had lasted longer than a few seconds. Getting the two to refocus, Fox came up with a quick plan to get them away from the others - he challenged them to an eating contest, away from the other fighters. They quickly agreed.
1541.title: Realize its the Brawlers

15411.content:
Sometime later, all three characters consisting of Fox Wolf and Sonic had gathered for their eating contest as they took their positions in front of three big tubs filled with their favorite extra fattening dessert.

For Fox Mccloud white pudding extra fattening.

For Wolf O'Donnell moldy cheese mousse extra fattening.

For Sonic the hedgehog cookie dough extra fattening.

At that moment, all three didn't need to wait for anyone to tell them to start eating as each one started eating out of their big tubs as they were gaining extra pounds until one of the three finished eating first and had now gotten slightly bigger and heavier than before.

Who was it that won?
15411.title: Cut to their new locations

choices: Denied I'm too afraid I will explode
154112.content: Sonic wins and he had gained about 400 pounds and his belly was now bulging out so far it was about to the point of explosion but it still wasn't done pit was becoming jealous of his size and wanted to become as big as sonic despite how big he already was he challenged sonic to another eating contest sonic...
154112.title: Sonic the hedgehog.

1541122.content:
"Pit I'm going to have to deny accepting your challenge because I'm afraid i'll explode." Sonic informed Pit.

"So you're denying my challenge to compete against me in an eating contest. Very well then, you and three of your friends will compete against yours truly in a male modeling pageant named Mr Sumo Dumbbell." Pit told Sonic.

"Okay you're on, but i was wondering where it will take place here on dessert isle?" Sonic asked Pit.

"On the beach where the plane crashed, as the stage there has already been set up and where the others are". Pit said.

Later on, all four contestants consisting of Fox who was now just as big as Sonic, Wolf also the same size, Sonic the hedgehog, and their rival Pit were onstage as one of the contestants was about to pose first.

Who's up first to pose for the crowd themselves?
1541122.title: Denied I'm too afraid I will explode

15412.content: Fox, Sonic, and Wolf binged so much that they're clothing ripped off of them completely. Their bloated bellies are roughly the shape of a giant blueberry. However in the mist of their relaxing, one of them swallows the other two whole. And that Brawler is.....................
15412.title: an hour of frantic binging later...

Pikachu gets away and Kirby sucks up the mountain of candy and absorbs it

info.brief_description: Brawl chars crash on dessert island, gain weight and weight 4 rescue
info.description: While on a flight to Delfino Island, the crew of Super Smash Bros Brawl crashes on a dessert island. (No, I did not spell that wrong. It actually is made out of cakes, sweets, etc. And that stuff is replenished almost instantaneously.) Having not much else to do, the group decides to see how much they can gain before they are rescued...
info.pretty_title: Smash Bros Dessert Isle Weight Gain
